text: 6.16: Mt 6.24; Zo 8.34; 2 Pi 2.19Ee, nde khueŋ kaŋgi fhuve? Nde warir guma mbe nɨɨŋgiap ana nzuai buni zɨn vui, nde fhura anan ŋaara gumgir khɨni ki. Mba tɨvara, nde tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbuav fhura ntan ŋaara gumgir khɨni ki. Mba tɨv nde mbuim, nde fhura vhɨzi gumgi ma. O, nde Fhe Bakɨme nzuai buni zɨn vui, mba tɨv nde mbuim, nde tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui gumgi gu mbigi ma.
